instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open a spreadsheet in the Google Sheets app . Tap Insert and then Image . Choose to place your image in the cell or over the cells. Cells with an image cannot also have text. Choose where to get your image from. Tap a photo.
On your Android phone or tablet, open a spreadsheet in the Google Sheets app . Tap and hold the image you want to move. Tap Cut . Tap and hold the cell you want to move the image to. Tap Paste .

Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 12 1 Open the App Store. You can create an Apple ID without a credit card by attempting to download a Free app from the App Store. You will need to ensure that your phone is not already logged in with an Apple ID. Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 13 2 Find a free app to install. There should be several available right from the main page, or you can search for specific apps. Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 14 3 Tap the "Free" button, and then tap the "Install" button that appears. Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 15 4 Tap "Create New Apple ID" when prompted to sign in. Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 16 5 Fill out all of the information required. You will be asked to enter your email address, create a password, and create some security questions, and enter your birthday. Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 17 6 Tap "None" as your payment type. If "None" is not available, click here for potential reasons why . Image titled Create an iTunes Account Without a Credit Card Step 18 7 Verify your account. Click the link in the verification email that is sent to the email address you provided. Once you click the link, your Apple ID is ready to go. Advertisement
